2525/*!
2526 \reimp
2527*/
2528
2529void QHeaderView::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *e)
2530{
2531 Q_D(QHeaderView);
2532 if (d->state != QHeaderViewPrivate::NoState || e->button() != Qt::LeftButton)
2533 return;
2534 int pos = d->orientation == Qt::Horizontal ? e->position().toPoint().x() : e->position().toPoint().y();
2535 int handle = d->sectionHandleAt(position: pos);
2536 d->originalSize = -1; // clear the stored original size
2537 if (handle == -1) {
2538 d->firstPressed = d->pressed = logicalIndexAt(position: pos);
2539 if (d->clickableSections)
2540 emit sectionPressed(logicalIndex: d->pressed);
2541
2542 bool acceptMoveSection = d->movableSections;
2543 if (acceptMoveSection && d->pressed == 0 && !d->allowUserMoveOfSection0)
2544 acceptMoveSection = false; // Do not allow moving the tree nod
2545
2546 if (acceptMoveSection) {
2547 d->target = -1;
2548 d->section = d->pressed;
2549 if (d->section == -1)
2550 return;
2551 d->state = QHeaderViewPrivate::MoveSection;
2552 d->setupSectionIndicator(section: d->section, position: pos);
2553 } else if (d->clickableSections && d->pressed != -1) {
2554 updateSection(logicalIndex: d->pressed);
2555 d->state = QHeaderViewPrivate::SelectSections;
2556 }
2557 } else if (sectionResizeMode(logicalIndex: handle) == Interactive) {
2558 d->originalSize = sectionSize(logicalIndex: handle);
2559 d->state = QHeaderViewPrivate::ResizeSection;
2560 d->section = handle;
2561 d->preventCursorChangeInSetOffset = false;
2562 }
2563
2564 d->firstPos = pos;
2565 d->lastPos = pos;
2566
2567 d->clearCascadingSections();
2568}
2569
2570/*!
2571 \reimp
2572*/
2573
2574void QHeaderView::mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *e)
2575{
2576 Q_D(QHeaderView);
2577 int pos = d->orientation == Qt::Horizontal ? e->position().toPoint().x() : e->position().toPoint().y();
2578 if (pos < 0 && d->state != QHeaderViewPrivate::SelectSections)
2579 return;
2580 if (e->buttons() == Qt::NoButton) {
2581 // Under Cocoa, when the mouse button is released, may include an extra
2582 // simulated mouse moved event. The state of the buttons when this event
2583 // is generated is already "no button" and the code below gets executed
2584 // just before the mouseReleaseEvent and resets the state. This prevents
2585 // column dragging from working. So this code is disabled under Cocoa.
2586 d->state = QHeaderViewPrivate::NoState;
2587 d->firstPressed = d->pressed = -1;
2588 }
2589 switch (d->state) {
2590 case QHeaderViewPrivate::ResizeSection: {
2591 Q_ASSERT(d->originalSize != -1);
2592 if (d->cascadingResizing) {
2593 int delta = d->reverse() ? d->lastPos - pos : pos - d->lastPos;
2594 int visual = visualIndex(logicalIndex: d->section);
2595 d->cascadingResize(visual, newSize: d->headerSectionSize(visual) + delta);
2596 } else {
2597 int delta = d->reverse() ? d->firstPos - pos : pos - d->firstPos;
2598 int newsize = qBound(min: minimumSectionSize(), val: d->originalSize + delta, max: maximumSectionSize());
2599 resizeSection(logical: d->section, size: newsize);
2600 }
2601 d->lastPos = pos;
2602 return;
2603 }
2604 case QHeaderViewPrivate::MoveSection: {
2605 if (d->shouldAutoScroll(pos: e->position().toPoint()))
2606 d->startAutoScroll();
2607 if (qAbs(t: pos - d->firstPos) >= QApplication::startDragDistance()
2608#if QT_CONFIG(label)
2609 || !d->sectionIndicator->isHidden()
2610#endif
2611 ) {
2612 int visual = visualIndexAt(position: pos);
2613 if (visual == -1)
2614 return;
2615 if (visual == 0 && logicalIndex(visualIndex: 0) == 0 && !d->allowUserMoveOfSection0)
2616 return;
2617
2618 const int posThreshold = d->headerSectionPosition(visual) - d->offset + d->headerSectionSize(visual) / 2;
2619 const int checkPos = d->reverse() ? d->viewport->width() - pos : pos;
2620 int moving = visualIndex(logicalIndex: d->section);
2621 int oldTarget = d->target;
2622 if (visual < moving) {
2623 if (checkPos < posThreshold)
2624 d->target = d->logicalIndex(visualIndex: visual);
2625 else
2626 d->target = d->logicalIndex(visualIndex: visual + 1);
2627 } else if (visual > moving) {
2628 if (checkPos > posThreshold)
2629 d->target = d->logicalIndex(visualIndex: visual);
2630 else
2631 d->target = d->logicalIndex(visualIndex: visual - 1);
2632 } else {
2633 d->target = d->section;
2634 }
2635 if (oldTarget != d->target || oldTarget == -1)
2636 d->updateSectionsBeforeAfter(logical: d->target);
2637 d->updateSectionIndicator(section: d->section, position: pos);
2638 }
2639 return;
2640 }
2641 case QHeaderViewPrivate::SelectSections: {
2642 int logical = logicalIndexAt(position: qMax(a: -d->offset, b: pos));
2643 if (logical == -1 && pos > 0)
2644 logical = logicalIndex(visualIndex: d->lastVisibleVisualIndex());
2645 if (logical == d->pressed)
2646 return; // nothing to do
2647 else if (d->pressed != -1)
2648 updateSection(logicalIndex: d->pressed);
2649 d->pressed = logical;
2650 if (d->clickableSections && logical != -1) {
2651 emit sectionEntered(logicalIndex: d->pressed);
2652 updateSection(logicalIndex: d->pressed);
2653 }
2654 return;
2655 }
2656 case QHeaderViewPrivate::NoState: {
2657#ifndef QT_NO_CURSOR
2658 int handle = d->sectionHandleAt(position: pos);
2659 bool hasCursor = testAttribute(attribute: Qt::WA_SetCursor);
2660 if (handle != -1 && (sectionResizeMode(logicalIndex: handle) == Interactive)) {
2661 if (!hasCursor)
2662 setCursor(d->orientation == Qt::Horizontal ? Qt::SplitHCursor : Qt::SplitVCursor);
2663 } else {
2664 if (hasCursor)
2665 unsetCursor();
2666#ifndef QT_NO_STATUSTIP
2667 int logical = logicalIndexAt(position: pos);
2668 QString statusTip;
2669 if (logical != -1)
2670 statusTip = d->model->headerData(section: logical, orientation: d->orientation, role: Qt::StatusTipRole).toString();
2671 if (d->shouldClearStatusTip || !statusTip.isEmpty()) {
2672 QStatusTipEvent tip(statusTip);
2673 QCoreApplication::sendEvent(receiver: d->parent ? d->parent : this, event: &tip);
2674 d->shouldClearStatusTip = !statusTip.isEmpty();
2675 }
2676#endif // !QT_NO_STATUSTIP
2677 }
2678#endif
2679 return;
2680 }
2681 default:
2682 break;
2683 }
2684}
2685
2686/*!
2687 \reimp
2688*/
2689
2690void QHeaderView::mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent *e)
2691{
2692 Q_D(QHeaderView);
2693 int pos = d->orientation == Qt::Horizontal ? e->position().toPoint().x() : e->position().toPoint().y();
2694 switch (d->state) {
2695 case QHeaderViewPrivate::MoveSection:
2696 if (true
2697#if QT_CONFIG(label)
2698 && !d->sectionIndicator->isHidden()
2699#endif
2700 ) { // moving
2701 int from = visualIndex(logicalIndex: d->section);
2702 Q_ASSERT(from != -1);
2703 int to = visualIndex(logicalIndex: d->target);
2704 Q_ASSERT(to != -1);
2705 moveSection(from, to);
2706 d->section = d->target = -1;
2707 d->updateSectionIndicator(section: d->section, position: pos);
2708 if (from == to)
2709 d->updateSectionsBeforeAfter(logical: from);
2710 break;
2711 } // not moving
2712 Q_FALLTHROUGH();
2713 case QHeaderViewPrivate::SelectSections:
2714 if (!d->clickableSections) {
2715 int section = logicalIndexAt(position: pos);
2716 updateSection(logicalIndex: section);
2717 }
2718 Q_FALLTHROUGH();
2719 case QHeaderViewPrivate::NoState:
2720 if (d->clickableSections) {
2721 int section = logicalIndexAt(position: pos);
2722 if (section != -1 && section == d->firstPressed) {
2723 QRect firstPressedSectionRect;
2724 switch (d->orientation) {
2725 case Qt::Horizontal:
2726 firstPressedSectionRect.setRect(ax: sectionViewportPosition(logicalIndex: d->firstPressed),
2727 ay: 0,
2728 aw: sectionSize(logicalIndex: d->firstPressed),
2729 ah: d->viewport->height());
2730 break;
2731 case Qt::Vertical:
2732 firstPressedSectionRect.setRect(ax: 0,
2733 ay: sectionViewportPosition(logicalIndex: d->firstPressed),
2734 aw: d->viewport->width(),
2735 ah: sectionSize(logicalIndex: d->firstPressed));
2736 break;
2737 };
2738
2739 if (firstPressedSectionRect.contains(p: e->position().toPoint())) {
2740 d->flipSortIndicator(section);
2741 emit sectionClicked(logicalIndex: section);
2742 }
2743 }
2744 if (d->pressed != -1)
2745 updateSection(logicalIndex: d->pressed);
2746 }
2747 break;
2748 case QHeaderViewPrivate::ResizeSection:
2749 d->originalSize = -1;
2750 d->clearCascadingSections();
2751 break;
2752 default:
2753 break;
2754 }
2755 d->state = QHeaderViewPrivate::NoState;
2756 d->firstPressed = d->pressed = -1;
2757}
2758
2759/*!
2760 \reimp
2761*/
2762
2763void QHeaderView::mouseDoubleClickEvent(QMouseEvent *e)
2764{
2765 Q_D(QHeaderView);
2766 int pos = d->orientation == Qt::Horizontal ? e->position().toPoint().x() : e->position().toPoint().y();
2767 int handle = d->sectionHandleAt(position: pos);
2768 if (handle > -1 && sectionResizeMode(logicalIndex: handle) == Interactive) {
2769 emit sectionHandleDoubleClicked(logicalIndex: handle);
2770#ifndef QT_NO_CURSOR
2771 Qt::CursorShape splitCursor = (d->orientation == Qt::Horizontal)
2772 ? Qt::SplitHCursor : Qt::SplitVCursor;
2773 if (cursor().shape() == splitCursor) {
2774 // signal handlers may have changed the section size
2775 handle = d->sectionHandleAt(position: pos);
2776 if (!(handle > -1 && sectionResizeMode(logicalIndex: handle) == Interactive))
2777 setCursor(Qt::ArrowCursor);
2778 }
2779#endif
2780 } else {
2781 emit sectionDoubleClicked(logicalIndex: logicalIndexAt(apos: e->position().toPoint()));
2782 }
2783}
2784
2785/*!
2786 \reimp
2787*/
2788
2789bool QHeaderView::viewportEvent(QEvent *e)
2790{
2791 Q_D(QHeaderView);
2792 switch (e->type()) {
2793#if QT_CONFIG(tooltip)
2794 case QEvent::ToolTip: {
2795 QHelpEvent *he = static_cast<QHelpEvent*>(e);
2796 int logical = logicalIndexAt(apos: he->pos());
2797 if (logical != -1) {
2798 QVariant variant = d->model->headerData(section: logical, orientation: d->orientation, role: Qt::ToolTipRole);
2799 if (variant.isValid()) {
2800 QToolTip::showText(pos: he->globalPos(), text: variant.toString(), w: this);
2801 return true;
2802 }
2803 }
2804 break; }
2805#endif
2806#if QT_CONFIG(whatsthis)
2807 case QEvent::QueryWhatsThis: {
2808 QHelpEvent *he = static_cast<QHelpEvent*>(e);
2809 int logical = logicalIndexAt(apos: he->pos());
2810 if (logical != -1
2811 && d->model->headerData(section: logical, orientation: d->orientation, role: Qt::WhatsThisRole).isValid())
2812 return true;
2813 break; }
2814 case QEvent::WhatsThis: {
2815 QHelpEvent *he = static_cast<QHelpEvent*>(e);
2816 int logical = logicalIndexAt(apos: he->pos());
2817 if (logical != -1) {
2818 QVariant whatsthis = d->model->headerData(section: logical, orientation: d->orientation,
2819 role: Qt::WhatsThisRole);
2820 if (whatsthis.isValid()) {
2821 QWhatsThis::showText(pos: he->globalPos(), text: whatsthis.toString(), w: this);
2822 return true;
2823 }
2824 }
2825 break; }
2826#endif // QT_CONFIG(whatsthis)
2827#if QT_CONFIG(statustip)
2828 case QEvent::StatusTip: {
2829 QHelpEvent *he = static_cast<QHelpEvent*>(e);
2830 int logical = logicalIndexAt(apos: he->pos());
2831 if (logical != -1) {
2832 QString statustip = d->model->headerData(section: logical, orientation: d->orientation,
2833 role: Qt::StatusTipRole).toString();
2834 if (!statustip.isEmpty())
2835 setStatusTip(statustip);
2836 }
2837 return true; }
2838#endif // QT_CONFIG(statustip)
2839 case QEvent::Resize:
2840 case QEvent::FontChange:
2841 case QEvent::StyleChange:
2842 d->invalidateCachedSizeHint();
2843 Q_FALLTHROUGH();
2844 case QEvent::Hide:
2845 case QEvent::Show: {
2846 QAbstractScrollArea *parent = qobject_cast<QAbstractScrollArea *>(object: parentWidget());
2847 if (parent && parent->isVisible()) // Only resize if we have a visible parent
2848 resizeSections();
2849 emit geometriesChanged();
2850 break;}
2851 case QEvent::ContextMenu: {
2852 d->state = QHeaderViewPrivate::NoState;
2853 d->pressed = d->section = d->target = -1;
2854 d->updateSectionIndicator(section: d->section, position: -1);
2855 break; }
2856 case QEvent::Wheel: {
2857 QAbstractScrollArea *asa = qobject_cast<QAbstractScrollArea *>(object: parentWidget());
2858 if (asa)
2859 return QCoreApplication::sendEvent(receiver: asa->viewport(), event: e);
2860 break; }
2861 default:
2862 break;
2863 }
2864 return QAbstractItemView::viewportEvent(event: e);
2865}

2867/*!
2868 \fn void QHeaderView::initStyleOptionForIndex(QStyleOptionHeader *option, int logicalIndex) const
2869 \since 6.0
2870
2871 Initializes the style \a option from the specified \a logicalIndex.
2872 This function is called by the default implementation of paintSection after
2873 initStyleOption has been called.
2874
2875 \sa paintSection(), initStyleOption()
2876*/
2877
2878void QHeaderView::initStyleOptionForIndex(QStyleOptionHeader *option, int logicalIndex) const
2879{
2880 Q_D(const QHeaderView);
2881
2882 if (!option)
2883 return;
2884 QStyleOptionHeader &opt = *option;
2885 QStyleOptionHeaderV2 *optV2 = qstyleoption_cast<QStyleOptionHeaderV2*>(opt: option);
2886
2887 QStyle::State state = QStyle::State_None;
2888 if (window()->isActiveWindow())
2889 state |= QStyle::State_Active;
2890 if (d->clickableSections) {
2891 if (logicalIndex == d->hover)
2892 state |= QStyle::State_MouseOver;
2893 if (logicalIndex == d->pressed)
2894 state |= QStyle::State_Sunken;
2895 else if (d->highlightSelected) {
2896 if (d->sectionIntersectsSelection(logical: logicalIndex))
2897 state |= QStyle::State_On;
2898 if (d->isSectionSelected(section: logicalIndex))
2899 state |= QStyle::State_Sunken;
2900 }
2901 }
2902 if (isSortIndicatorShown() && sortIndicatorSection() == logicalIndex)
2903 opt.sortIndicator = (sortIndicatorOrder() == Qt::AscendingOrder)
2904 ? QStyleOptionHeader::SortDown : QStyleOptionHeader::SortUp;
2905
2906 // setup the style options structure
2907 QVariant textAlignment = d->model->headerData(section: logicalIndex, orientation: d->orientation,
2908 role: Qt::TextAlignmentRole);
2909 opt.section = logicalIndex;
2910 opt.state |= state;
2911 opt.textAlignment = textAlignment.isValid()
2912 ? QtPrivate::legacyFlagValueFromModelData<Qt::Alignment>(data: textAlignment)
2913 : d->defaultAlignment;
2914
2915 opt.iconAlignment = Qt::AlignVCenter;
2916 opt.text = d->model->headerData(section: logicalIndex, orientation: d->orientation,
2917 role: Qt::DisplayRole).toString();
2918
2919 const QVariant variant = d->model->headerData(section: logicalIndex, orientation: d->orientation,
2920 role: Qt::DecorationRole);
2921 opt.icon = qvariant_cast<QIcon>(v: variant);
2922 if (opt.icon.isNull())
2923 opt.icon = qvariant_cast<QPixmap>(v: variant);
2924
2925 QVariant var = d->model->headerData(section: logicalIndex, orientation: d->orientation,
2926 role: Qt::FontRole);
2927 if (var.isValid() && var.canConvert<QFont>())
2928 opt.fontMetrics = QFontMetrics(qvariant_cast<QFont>(v: var));
2929 if (optV2)
2930 optV2->textElideMode = d->textElideMode;
2931
2932 QVariant foregroundBrush = d->model->headerData(section: logicalIndex, orientation: d->orientation,
2933 role: Qt::ForegroundRole);
2934 if (foregroundBrush.canConvert<QBrush>())
2935 opt.palette.setBrush(acr: QPalette::ButtonText, abrush: qvariant_cast<QBrush>(v: foregroundBrush));
2936
2937 QVariant backgroundBrush = d->model->headerData(section: logicalIndex, orientation: d->orientation,
2938 role: Qt::BackgroundRole);
2939 if (backgroundBrush.canConvert<QBrush>()) {
2940 opt.palette.setBrush(acr: QPalette::Button, abrush: qvariant_cast<QBrush>(v: backgroundBrush));
2941 opt.palette.setBrush(acr: QPalette::Window, abrush: qvariant_cast<QBrush>(v: backgroundBrush));
2942 }
2943
2944 // the section position
2945 int visual = visualIndex(logicalIndex);
2946 Q_ASSERT(visual != -1);
2947 bool first = d->isFirstVisibleSection(section: visual);
2948 bool last = d->isLastVisibleSection(section: visual);
2949 if (first && last)
2950 opt.position = QStyleOptionHeader::OnlyOneSection;
2951 else if (first)
2952 opt.position = d->reverse() ? QStyleOptionHeader::End : QStyleOptionHeader::Beginning;
2953 else if (last)
2954 opt.position = d->reverse() ? QStyleOptionHeader::Beginning : QStyleOptionHeader::End;
2955 else
2956 opt.position = QStyleOptionHeader::Middle;
2957 opt.orientation = d->orientation;
2958 // the selected position
2959 bool previousSelected = d->isSectionSelected(section: this->logicalIndex(visualIndex: visual - 1));
2960 bool nextSelected = d->isSectionSelected(section: this->logicalIndex(visualIndex: visual + 1));
2961 if (previousSelected && nextSelected)
2962 opt.selectedPosition = QStyleOptionHeader::NextAndPreviousAreSelected;
2963 else if (previousSelected)
2964 opt.selectedPosition = QStyleOptionHeader::PreviousIsSelected;
2965 else if (nextSelected)
2966 opt.selectedPosition = QStyleOptionHeader::NextIsSelected;
2967 else
2968 opt.selectedPosition = QStyleOptionHeader::NotAdjacent;
2969 if (optV2)
2970 optV2->isSectionDragTarget = d->target == logicalIndex;
2971}
2972
2973/*!
2974 Paints the section specified by the given \a logicalIndex, using the given
2975 \a painter and \a rect.
2976
2977 Normally, you do not have to call this function.
2978*/
2979
2980void QHeaderView::paintSection(QPainter *painter, const QRect &rect, int logicalIndex) const
2981{
2982 if (!rect.isValid())
2983 return;
2984
2985 QStyleOptionHeaderV2 opt;
2986 QPointF oldBO = painter->brushOrigin();
2987
2988 initStyleOption(option: &opt);
2989
2990 QBrush oBrushButton = opt.palette.brush(cr: QPalette::Button);
2991 QBrush oBrushWindow = opt.palette.brush(cr: QPalette::Window);
2992
2993 initStyleOptionForIndex(option: &opt, logicalIndex);
2994 // We set rect here. If it needs to be changed it can be changed by overriding this function
2995 opt.rect = rect;
2996
2997 QBrush nBrushButton = opt.palette.brush(cr: QPalette::Button);
2998 QBrush nBrushWindow = opt.palette.brush(cr: QPalette::Window);
2999
3000 // If relevant brushes are not the same as from the regular widgets we set the brush origin
3001 if (oBrushButton != nBrushButton || oBrushWindow != nBrushWindow) {
3002 painter->setBrushOrigin(opt.rect.topLeft());
3003 }
3004
3005 // draw the section.
3006 style()->drawControl(element: QStyle::CE_Header, opt: &opt, p: painter, w: this);
3007 painter->setBrushOrigin(oldBO);
3008}
3009
3010/*!
3011 Returns the size of the contents of the section specified by the given
3012 \a logicalIndex.
3013
3014 \sa defaultSectionSize()
3015*/
3016
3017QSize QHeaderView::sectionSizeFromContents(int logicalIndex) const
3018{
3019 Q_D(const QHeaderView);
3020 Q_ASSERT(logicalIndex >= 0);
3021
3022 ensurePolished();
3023
3024 // use SizeHintRole
3025 QVariant variant = d->model->headerData(section: logicalIndex, orientation: d->orientation, role: Qt::SizeHintRole);
3026 if (variant.isValid())
3027 return qvariant_cast<QSize>(v: variant);
3028
3029 // otherwise use the contents
3030 QStyleOptionHeaderV2 opt;
3031 initStyleOption(option: &opt);
3032 opt.section = logicalIndex;
3033 QVariant var = d->model->headerData(section: logicalIndex, orientation: d->orientation,
3034 role: Qt::FontRole);
3035 QFont fnt;
3036 if (var.isValid() && var.canConvert<QFont>())
3037 fnt = qvariant_cast<QFont>(v: var);
3038 else
3039 fnt = font();
3040 fnt.setBold(true);
3041 opt.fontMetrics = QFontMetrics(fnt);
3042 opt.text = d->model->headerData(section: logicalIndex, orientation: d->orientation,
3043 role: Qt::DisplayRole).toString();
3044 variant = d->model->headerData(section: logicalIndex, orientation: d->orientation, role: Qt::DecorationRole);
3045 opt.icon = qvariant_cast<QIcon>(v: variant);
3046 if (opt.icon.isNull())
3047 opt.icon = qvariant_cast<QPixmap>(v: variant);
3048 if (isSortIndicatorShown())
3049 opt.sortIndicator = QStyleOptionHeader::SortDown;
3050 return style()->sizeFromContents(ct: QStyle::CT_HeaderSection, opt: &opt, contentsSize: QSize(), w: this);
3051}

3107/*!
3108 \reimp
3109 \internal
3110*/
3111void QHeaderView::dataChanged(const QModelIndex &topLeft, const QModelIndex &bottomRight,
3112 const QList<int> &roles)
3113{
3114 Q_D(QHeaderView);
3115 if (!roles.isEmpty()) {
3116 const auto doesRoleAffectSize = [](int role) -> bool {
3117 switch (role) {
3118 case Qt::DisplayRole:
3119 case Qt::DecorationRole:
3120 case Qt::SizeHintRole:
3121 case Qt::FontRole:
3122 return true;
3123 default:
3124 // who knows what a subclass or custom style might do
3125 return role >= Qt::UserRole;
3126 }
3127 };
3128 if (std::none_of(first: roles.begin(), last: roles.end(), pred: doesRoleAffectSize))
3129 return;
3130 }
3131 d->invalidateCachedSizeHint();
3132 if (d->hasAutoResizeSections()) {
3133 bool resizeRequired = d->globalResizeMode == ResizeToContents;
3134 int first = orientation() == Qt::Horizontal ? topLeft.column() : topLeft.row();
3135 int last = orientation() == Qt::Horizontal ? bottomRight.column() : bottomRight.row();
3136 for (int i = first; i <= last && !resizeRequired; ++i)
3137 resizeRequired = (sectionResizeMode(logicalIndex: i) == ResizeToContents);
3138 if (resizeRequired)
3139 d->doDelayedResizeSections();
3140 }
3141}

3227
3228/*!
3229 \internal
3230*/
3231
3232QRegion QHeaderView::visualRegionForSelection(const QItemSelection &selection) const
3233{
3234 Q_D(const QHeaderView);
3235 const int max = d->modelSectionCount();
3236
3237 if (d->orientation == Qt::Horizontal) {
3238 int logicalLeft = max;
3239 int logicalRight = 0;
3240
3241 if (d->visualIndices.empty()) {
3242 // If no reordered sections, skip redundant visual-to-logical transformations
3243 for (const auto &r : selection) {
3244 if (r.parent().isValid() || !r.isValid())
3245 continue; // we only know about toplevel items and we don't want invalid ranges
3246 if (r.left() < logicalLeft)
3247 logicalLeft = r.left();
3248 if (r.right() > logicalRight)
3249 logicalRight = r.right();
3250 }
3251 } else {
3252 int left = max;
3253 int right = 0;
3254 for (const auto &r : selection) {
3255 if (r.parent().isValid() || !r.isValid())
3256 continue; // we only know about toplevel items and we don't want invalid ranges
3257 for (int k = r.left(); k <= r.right(); ++k) {
3258 int visual = visualIndex(logicalIndex: k);
3259 if (visual == -1) // in some cases users may change the selections
3260 continue; // before we have a chance to do the layout
3261 if (visual < left)
3262 left = visual;
3263 if (visual > right)
3264 right = visual;
3265 }
3266 }
3267 logicalLeft = logicalIndex(visualIndex: left);
3268 logicalRight = logicalIndex(visualIndex: right);
3269 }
3270
3271 if (logicalLeft < 0 || logicalLeft >= count() ||
3272 logicalRight < 0 || logicalRight >= count())
3273 return QRegion();
3274
3275 int leftPos = sectionViewportPosition(logicalIndex: logicalLeft);
3276 int rightPos = sectionViewportPosition(logicalIndex: logicalRight);
3277 rightPos += sectionSize(logicalIndex: logicalRight);
3278 return QRect(leftPos, 0, rightPos - leftPos, height());
3279 }
3280 // orientation() == Qt::Vertical
3281 int logicalTop = max;
3282 int logicalBottom = 0;
3283
3284 if (d->visualIndices.empty()) {
3285 // If no reordered sections, skip redundant visual-to-logical transformations
3286 for (const auto &r : selection) {
3287 if (r.parent().isValid() || !r.isValid())
3288 continue; // we only know about toplevel items and we don't want invalid ranges
3289 if (r.top() < logicalTop)
3290 logicalTop = r.top();
3291 if (r.bottom() > logicalBottom)
3292 logicalBottom = r.bottom();
3293 }
3294 } else {
3295 int top = max;
3296 int bottom = 0;
3297
3298 for (const auto &r : selection) {
3299 if (r.parent().isValid() || !r.isValid())
3300 continue; // we only know about toplevel items and we don't want invalid ranges
3301 for (int k = r.top(); k <= r.bottom(); ++k) {
3302 int visual = visualIndex(logicalIndex: k);
3303 if (visual == -1) // in some cases users may change the selections
3304 continue; // before we have a chance to do the layout
3305 if (visual < top)
3306 top = visual;
3307 if (visual > bottom)
3308 bottom = visual;
3309 }
3310 }
3311
3312 logicalTop = logicalIndex(visualIndex: top);
3313 logicalBottom = logicalIndex(visualIndex: bottom);
3314 }
3315
3316 if (logicalTop < 0 || logicalTop >= count() ||
3317 logicalBottom < 0 || logicalBottom >= count())
3318 return QRegion();
3319
3320 int topPos = sectionViewportPosition(logicalIndex: logicalTop);
3321 int bottomPos = sectionViewportPosition(logicalIndex: logicalBottom) + sectionSize(logicalIndex: logicalBottom);
3322
3323 return QRect(0, topPos, width(), bottomPos - topPos);
3324}
3325
3326
3327// private implementation
3328
3329int QHeaderViewPrivate::sectionHandleAt(int position)
3330{
3331 Q_Q(QHeaderView);
3332 int visual = q->visualIndexAt(position);
3333 if (visual == -1)
3334 return -1;
3335 int log = logicalIndex(visualIndex: visual);
3336 int pos = q->sectionViewportPosition(logicalIndex: log);
3337 int grip = q->style()->pixelMetric(metric: QStyle::PM_HeaderGripMargin, option: nullptr, widget: q);
3338
3339 bool atLeft = position < pos + grip;
3340 bool atRight = (position > pos + q->sectionSize(logicalIndex: log) - grip);
3341 if (reverse())
3342 qSwap(value1&: atLeft, value2&: atRight);
3343
3344 if (atLeft) {
3345 //grip at the beginning of the section
3346 while(visual > -1) {
3347 int logical = q->logicalIndex(visualIndex: --visual);
3348 if (!q->isSectionHidden(logicalIndex: logical))
3349 return logical;
3350 }
3351 } else if (atRight) {
3352 //grip at the end of the section
3353 return log;
3354 }
3355 return -1;
3356}
3357
3358void QHeaderViewPrivate::setupSectionIndicator(int section, int position)
3359{
3360 Q_Q(QHeaderView);
3361#if QT_CONFIG(label)
3362 if (!sectionIndicator) {
3363 sectionIndicator = new QLabel(viewport);
3364 }
3365#endif
3366
3367 int w, h;
3368 int p = q->sectionViewportPosition(logicalIndex: section);
3369 if (orientation == Qt::Horizontal) {
3370 w = q->sectionSize(logicalIndex: section);
3371 h = viewport->height();
3372 } else {
3373 w = viewport->width();
3374 h = q->sectionSize(logicalIndex: section);
3375 }
3376#if QT_CONFIG(label)
3377 sectionIndicator->resize(w, h);
3378#endif
3379
3380 const qreal pixmapDevicePixelRatio = q->devicePixelRatio();
3381 QPixmap pm(QSize(w, h) * pixmapDevicePixelRatio);
3382 pm.setDevicePixelRatio(pixmapDevicePixelRatio);
3383 pm.fill(fillColor: QColor(0, 0, 0, 45));
3384 QRect rect(0, 0, w, h);
3385
3386 QPainter painter(&pm);
3387 const QVariant variant = model->headerData(section, orientation,
3388 role: Qt::FontRole);
3389 if (variant.isValid() && variant.canConvert<QFont>()) {
3390 const QFont sectionFont = qvariant_cast<QFont>(v: variant);
3391 painter.setFont(sectionFont);
3392 } else {
3393 painter.setFont(q->font());
3394 }
3395
3396 painter.setOpacity(0.75);
3397 q->paintSection(painter: &painter, rect, logicalIndex: section);
3398 painter.end();
3399
3400#if QT_CONFIG(label)
3401 sectionIndicator->setPixmap(pm);
3402#endif
3403 sectionIndicatorOffset = position - qMax(a: p, b: 0);
3404}
3405
3406void QHeaderViewPrivate::updateSectionIndicator(int section, int position)
3407{
3408#if QT_CONFIG(label)
3409 if (!sectionIndicator)
3410 return;
3411
3412 if (section == -1 || target == -1) {
3413 sectionIndicator->hide();
3414 return;
3415 }
3416
3417 if (orientation == Qt::Horizontal)
3418 sectionIndicator->move(ax: position - sectionIndicatorOffset, ay: 0);
3419 else
3420 sectionIndicator->move(ax: 0, ay: position - sectionIndicatorOffset);
3421
3422 sectionIndicator->show();
3423#endif
3424}
3425
3426/*!
3427 Initialize \a option with the values from this QHeaderView. This method is
3428 useful for subclasses when they need a QStyleOptionHeader, but do not want
3429 to fill in all the information themselves.
3430
3431 \sa QStyleOption::initFrom(), initStyleOptionForIndex()
3432*/
3433void QHeaderView::initStyleOption(QStyleOptionHeader *option) const
3434{
3435 Q_D(const QHeaderView);
3436 option->initFrom(w: this);
3437 option->state = QStyle::State_None | QStyle::State_Raised;
3438 option->orientation = d->orientation;
3439 if (d->orientation == Qt::Horizontal)
3440 option->state |= QStyle::State_Horizontal;
3441 if (isEnabled())
3442 option->state |= QStyle::State_Enabled;
3443 option->section = 0;
3444}
3445
3446void QHeaderView::initStyleOption(QStyleOptionFrame *option) const
3447{
3448 // The QFrame version is only here to avoid compiler warnings.
3449 // If invoked we just pass it on to the base class.
3450 QFrame::initStyleOption(option);
3451}
3452
3453bool QHeaderViewPrivate::isSectionSelected(int section) const
3454{
3455 int i = section * 2;
3456 if (i < 0 || i >= sectionSelected.size())
3457 return false;
3458 if (sectionSelected.testBit(i)) // if the value was cached
3459 return sectionSelected.testBit(i: i + 1);
3460 bool s = false;
3461 if (orientation == Qt::Horizontal)
3462 s = isColumnSelected(column: section);
3463 else
3464 s = isRowSelected(row: section);
3465 sectionSelected.setBit(i: i + 1, val: s); // selection state
3466 sectionSelected.setBit(i, val: true); // cache state
3467 return s;
3468}
3469
3470bool QHeaderViewPrivate::isFirstVisibleSection(int section) const
3471{
3472 if (sectionStartposRecalc)
3473 recalcSectionStartPos();
3474 const SectionItem &item = sectionItems.at(i: section);
3475 return item.size > 0 && item.calculated_startpos == 0;
3476}
3477
3478bool QHeaderViewPrivate::isLastVisibleSection(int section) const
3479{
3480 if (sectionStartposRecalc)
3481 recalcSectionStartPos();
3482 const SectionItem &item = sectionItems.at(i: section);
3483 return item.size > 0 && item.calculatedEndPos() == length;
3484}

3486/*!
3487 \internal
3488 Returns the last visible (ie. not hidden) visual index
3489*/
3490int QHeaderViewPrivate::lastVisibleVisualIndex() const
3491{
3492 Q_Q(const QHeaderView);
3493 for (int visual = q->count()-1; visual >= 0; --visual) {
3494 if (!q->isSectionHidden(logicalIndex: q->logicalIndex(visualIndex: visual)))
3495 return visual;
3496 }
3497
3498 //default value if no section is actually visible
3499 return -1;
3500}
3501
3502void QHeaderViewPrivate::restoreSizeOnPrevLastSection()
3503{
3504 Q_Q(QHeaderView);
3505 if (lastSectionLogicalIdx < 0)
3506 return;
3507 int resizeLogIdx = lastSectionLogicalIdx;
3508 lastSectionLogicalIdx = -1; // We do not want resize to catch it as the last section.
3509 q->resizeSection(logical: resizeLogIdx, size: lastSectionSize);
3510}
3511
3512void QHeaderViewPrivate::setNewLastSection(int visualIndexForLastSection)
3513{
3514 Q_Q(QHeaderView);
3515 lastSectionSize = -1;
3516 lastSectionLogicalIdx = q->logicalIndex(visualIndex: visualIndexForLastSection);
3517 lastSectionSize = headerSectionSize(visual: visualIndexForLastSection); // pick size directly since ...
3518 // q->sectionSize(lastSectionLogicalIdx) may do delayed resize and stretch it before we get the value.
3519}
3520
3521void QHeaderViewPrivate::maybeRestorePrevLastSectionAndStretchLast()
3522{
3523 Q_Q(const QHeaderView);
3524 if (!q->stretchLastSection())
3525 return;
3526
3527 int nowLastVisualSection = lastVisibleVisualIndex();
3528 if (lastSectionLogicalIdx == q->logicalIndex(visualIndex: nowLastVisualSection))
3529 return;
3530
3531 // restore old last section.
3532 restoreSizeOnPrevLastSection();
3533 setNewLastSection(nowLastVisualSection);
3534 doDelayedResizeSections(); // Do stretch of last section soon (but not now).
3535}
3536
3537
3538/*!
3539 \internal
3540 Go through and resize all of the sections applying stretchLastSection,
3541 manual stretches, sizes, and useGlobalMode.
3542
3543 The different resize modes are:
3544 Interactive - the user decides the size
3545 Stretch - take up whatever space is left
3546 Fixed - the size is set programmatically outside the header
3547 ResizeToContentes - the size is set based on the contents of the row or column in the parent view
3548
3549 The resize mode will not affect the last section if stretchLastSection is true.
3550*/
3551void QHeaderViewPrivate::resizeSections(QHeaderView::ResizeMode globalMode, bool useGlobalMode)
3552{
3553 Q_Q(QHeaderView);
3554 //stop the timer in case it is delayed
3555 delayedResize.stop();
3556
3557 executePostedLayout();
3558 if (sectionCount() == 0)
3559 return;
3560
3561 if (resizeRecursionBlock)
3562 return;
3563 resizeRecursionBlock = true;
3564
3565 invalidateCachedSizeHint();
3566 const int lastSectionVisualIdx = q->visualIndex(logicalIndex: lastSectionLogicalIdx);
3567
3568 // find stretchLastSection if we have it
3569 int stretchSection = -1;
3570 if (stretchLastSection && !useGlobalMode)
3571 stretchSection = lastSectionVisualIdx;
3572
3573 // count up the number of stretched sections and how much space left for them
3574 int lengthToStretch = (orientation == Qt::Horizontal ? viewport->width() : viewport->height());
3575 int numberOfStretchedSections = 0;
3576 QList<int> section_sizes;
3577 for (int i = 0; i < sectionCount(); ++i) {
3578 if (isVisualIndexHidden(visual: i))
3579 continue;
3580
3581 QHeaderView::ResizeMode resizeMode;
3582 if (useGlobalMode && (i != stretchSection))
3583 resizeMode = globalMode;
3584 else
3585 resizeMode = (i == stretchSection ? QHeaderView::Stretch : headerSectionResizeMode(visual: i));
3586
3587 if (resizeMode == QHeaderView::Stretch) {
3588 ++numberOfStretchedSections;
3589 section_sizes.append(t: headerSectionSize(visual: i));
3590 continue;
3591 }
3592
3593 // because it isn't stretch, determine its width and remove that from lengthToStretch
3594 int sectionSize = 0;
3595 if (resizeMode == QHeaderView::Interactive || resizeMode == QHeaderView::Fixed) {
3596 sectionSize = qBound(min: q->minimumSectionSize(), val: headerSectionSize(visual: i), max: q->maximumSectionSize());
3597 } else { // resizeMode == QHeaderView::ResizeToContents
3598 int logicalIndex = q->logicalIndex(visualIndex: i);
3599 sectionSize = qMax(a: viewSectionSizeHint(logical: logicalIndex),
3600 b: q->sectionSizeHint(logicalIndex));
3601 }
3602 sectionSize = qBound(min: q->minimumSectionSize(),
3603 val: sectionSize,
3604 max: q->maximumSectionSize());
3605
3606 section_sizes.append(t: sectionSize);
3607 lengthToStretch -= sectionSize;
3608 }
3609
3610 // calculate the new length for all of the stretched sections
3611 int stretchSectionLength = -1;
3612 int pixelReminder = 0;
3613 if (numberOfStretchedSections > 0 && lengthToStretch > 0) { // we have room to stretch in
3614 int hintLengthForEveryStretchedSection = lengthToStretch / numberOfStretchedSections;
3615 stretchSectionLength = qMax(a: hintLengthForEveryStretchedSection, b: q->minimumSectionSize());
3616 pixelReminder = lengthToStretch % numberOfStretchedSections;
3617 }
3618
3619 // ### The code below would be nicer if it was cleaned up a bit (since spans has been replaced with items)
3620 int spanStartSection = 0;
3621 int previousSectionLength = 0;
3622
3623 QHeaderView::ResizeMode previousSectionResizeMode = QHeaderView::Interactive;
3624
3625 // resize each section along the total length
3626 for (int i = 0; i < sectionCount(); ++i) {
3627 int oldSectionLength = headerSectionSize(visual: i);
3628 int newSectionLength = -1;
3629 QHeaderView::ResizeMode newSectionResizeMode = headerSectionResizeMode(visual: i);
3630
3631 if (isVisualIndexHidden(visual: i)) {
3632 newSectionLength = 0;
3633 } else {
3634 QHeaderView::ResizeMode resizeMode;
3635 if (useGlobalMode)
3636 resizeMode = globalMode;
3637 else
3638 resizeMode = (i == stretchSection
3639 ? QHeaderView::Stretch
3640 : newSectionResizeMode);
3641 if (resizeMode == QHeaderView::Stretch && stretchSectionLength != -1) {
3642 if (i == lastSectionVisualIdx)
3643 newSectionLength = qMax(a: stretchSectionLength, b: lastSectionSize);
3644 else
3645 newSectionLength = stretchSectionLength;
3646 if (pixelReminder > 0) {
3647 newSectionLength += 1;
3648 --pixelReminder;
3649 }
3650 section_sizes.removeFirst();
3651 } else {
3652 newSectionLength = section_sizes.takeFirst();
3653 }
3654 }
3655
3656 //Q_ASSERT(newSectionLength > 0);
3657 if ((previousSectionResizeMode != newSectionResizeMode
3658 || previousSectionLength != newSectionLength) && i > 0) {
3659 createSectionItems(start: spanStartSection, end: i - 1, sectionSize: previousSectionLength, mode: previousSectionResizeMode);
3660 //Q_ASSERT(headerLength() == length);
3661 spanStartSection = i;
3662 }
3663
3664 if (newSectionLength != oldSectionLength)
3665 emit q->sectionResized(logicalIndex: logicalIndex(visualIndex: i), oldSize: oldSectionLength, newSize: newSectionLength);
3666
3667 previousSectionLength = newSectionLength;
3668 previousSectionResizeMode = newSectionResizeMode;
3669 }
3670
3671 createSectionItems(start: spanStartSection, end: sectionCount() - 1,
3672 sectionSize: previousSectionLength, mode: previousSectionResizeMode);
3673 //Q_ASSERT(headerLength() == length);
3674 resizeRecursionBlock = false;
3675 viewport->update();
3676}
3677
3678void QHeaderViewPrivate::createSectionItems(int start, int end, int sizePerSection, QHeaderView::ResizeMode mode)
3679{
3680 if (end >= sectionItems.size()) {
3681 sectionItems.resize(size: end + 1);
3682 sectionStartposRecalc = true;
3683 }
3684 SectionItem *sectiondata = sectionItems.data();
3685 for (int i = start; i <= end; ++i) {
3686 length += (sizePerSection - sectiondata[i].size);
3687 sectionStartposRecalc |= (sectiondata[i].size != sizePerSection);
3688 sectiondata[i].size = sizePerSection;
3689 sectiondata[i].resizeMode = mode;
3690 }
3691}
3692
3693void QHeaderViewPrivate::removeSectionsFromSectionItems(int start, int end)
3694{
3695 // remove sections
3696 sectionStartposRecalc |= (end != sectionItems.size() - 1);
3697 int removedlength = 0;
3698 for (int u = start; u <= end; ++u)
3699 removedlength += sectionItems.at(i: u).size;
3700 length -= removedlength;
3701 sectionItems.remove(i: start, n: end - start + 1);
3702}
3703
3704void QHeaderViewPrivate::clear()
3705{
3706 if (state != NoClear) {
3707 length = 0;
3708 visualIndices.clear();
3709 logicalIndices.clear();
3710 sectionSelected.clear();
3711 hiddenSectionSize.clear();
3712 sectionItems.clear();
3713 lastSectionLogicalIdx = -1;
3714 invalidateCachedSizeHint();
3715 }
3716}
3717
3718static Qt::SortOrder flipOrder(Qt::SortOrder order)
3719{
3720 switch (order) {
3721 case Qt::AscendingOrder:
3722 return Qt::DescendingOrder;
3723 case Qt::DescendingOrder:
3724 return Qt::AscendingOrder;
3725 };
3726 Q_UNREACHABLE_RETURN(Qt::AscendingOrder);
3727};
3728
3729void QHeaderViewPrivate::flipSortIndicator(int section)
3730{
3731 Q_Q(QHeaderView);
3732 Qt::SortOrder sortOrder;
3733 if (sortIndicatorSection == section) {
3734 if (sortIndicatorClearable) {
3735 const Qt::SortOrder defaultSortOrder = defaultSortOrderForSection(section);
3736 if (sortIndicatorOrder == defaultSortOrder) {
3737 sortOrder = flipOrder(order: sortIndicatorOrder);
3738 } else {
3739 section = -1;
3740 sortOrder = Qt::AscendingOrder;
3741 }
3742 } else {
3743 sortOrder = flipOrder(order: sortIndicatorOrder);
3744 }
3745 } else {
3746 sortOrder = defaultSortOrderForSection(section);
3747 }
3748 q->setSortIndicator(logicalIndex: section, order: sortOrder);
3749}
3750
3751Qt::SortOrder QHeaderViewPrivate::defaultSortOrderForSection(int section) const
3752{
3753 const QVariant value = model->headerData(section, orientation, role: Qt::InitialSortOrderRole);
3754 if (value.canConvert<int>())
3755 return static_cast<Qt::SortOrder>(value.toInt());
3756 return Qt::AscendingOrder;
3757}
3758
3759void QHeaderViewPrivate::cascadingResize(int visual, int newSize)
3760{
3761 Q_Q(QHeaderView);
3762 const int minimumSize = q->minimumSectionSize();
3763 const int oldSize = headerSectionSize(visual);
3764 int delta = newSize - oldSize;
3765
3766 if (delta > 0) { // larger
3767 bool sectionResized = false;
3768
3769 // restore old section sizes
3770 for (int i = firstCascadingSection; i < visual; ++i) {
3771 if (cascadingSectionSize.contains(key: i)) {
3772 int currentSectionSize = headerSectionSize(visual: i);
3773 int originalSectionSize = cascadingSectionSize.value(key: i);
3774 if (currentSectionSize < originalSectionSize) {
3775 int newSectionSize = currentSectionSize + delta;
3776 resizeSectionItem(visualIndex: i, oldSize: currentSectionSize, newSize: newSectionSize);
3777 if (newSectionSize >= originalSectionSize && false)
3778 cascadingSectionSize.remove(key: i); // the section is now restored
3779 sectionResized = true;
3780 break;
3781 }
3782 }
3783
3784 }
3785
3786 // resize the section
3787 if (!sectionResized) {
3788 newSize = qMax(a: newSize, b: minimumSize);
3789 if (oldSize != newSize)
3790 resizeSectionItem(visualIndex: visual, oldSize, newSize);
3791 }
3792
3793 // cascade the section size change
3794 for (int i = visual + 1; i < sectionCount(); ++i) {
3795 if (isVisualIndexHidden(visual: i))
3796 continue;
3797 if (!sectionIsCascadable(visual: i))
3798 continue;
3799 int currentSectionSize = headerSectionSize(visual: i);
3800 if (currentSectionSize <= minimumSize)
3801 continue;
3802 int newSectionSize = qMax(a: currentSectionSize - delta, b: minimumSize);
3803 //qDebug() << "### cascading to" << i << newSectionSize - currentSectionSize << delta;
3804 resizeSectionItem(visualIndex: i, oldSize: currentSectionSize, newSize: newSectionSize);
3805 saveCascadingSectionSize(visual: i, size: currentSectionSize);
3806 delta = delta - (currentSectionSize - newSectionSize);
3807 //qDebug() << "new delta" << delta;
3808 //if (newSectionSize != minimumSize)
3809 if (delta <= 0)
3810 break;
3811 }
3812 } else { // smaller
3813 bool sectionResized = false;
3814
3815 // restore old section sizes
3816 for (int i = lastCascadingSection; i > visual; --i) {
3817 if (!cascadingSectionSize.contains(key: i))
3818 continue;
3819 int currentSectionSize = headerSectionSize(visual: i);
3820 int originalSectionSize = cascadingSectionSize.value(key: i);
3821 if (currentSectionSize >= originalSectionSize)
3822 continue;
3823 int newSectionSize = currentSectionSize - delta;
3824 resizeSectionItem(visualIndex: i, oldSize: currentSectionSize, newSize: newSectionSize);
3825 if (newSectionSize >= originalSectionSize && false) {
3826 //qDebug() << "section" << i << "restored to" << originalSectionSize;
3827 cascadingSectionSize.remove(key: i); // the section is now restored
3828 }
3829 sectionResized = true;
3830 break;
3831 }
3832
3833 // resize the section
3834 resizeSectionItem(visualIndex: visual, oldSize, newSize: qMax(a: newSize, b: minimumSize));
3835
3836 // cascade the section size change
3837 if (delta < 0 && newSize < minimumSize) {
3838 for (int i = visual - 1; i >= 0; --i) {
3839 if (isVisualIndexHidden(visual: i))
3840 continue;
3841 if (!sectionIsCascadable(visual: i))
3842 continue;
3843 int sectionSize = headerSectionSize(visual: i);
3844 if (sectionSize <= minimumSize)
3845 continue;
3846 resizeSectionItem(visualIndex: i, oldSize: sectionSize, newSize: qMax(a: sectionSize + delta, b: minimumSize));
3847 saveCascadingSectionSize(visual: i, size: sectionSize);
3848 break;
3849 }
3850 }
3851
3852 // let the next section get the space from the resized section
3853 if (!sectionResized) {
3854 for (int i = visual + 1; i < sectionCount(); ++i) {
3855 if (isVisualIndexHidden(visual: i))
3856 continue;
3857 if (!sectionIsCascadable(visual: i))
3858 continue;
3859 int currentSectionSize = headerSectionSize(visual: i);
3860 int newSectionSize = qMax(a: currentSectionSize - delta, b: minimumSize);
3861 resizeSectionItem(visualIndex: i, oldSize: currentSectionSize, newSize: newSectionSize);
3862 break;
3863 }
3864 }
3865 }
3866
3867 if (hasAutoResizeSections())
3868 doDelayedResizeSections();
3869
3870 viewport->update();
3871}
3872
3873void QHeaderViewPrivate::setDefaultSectionSize(int size)
3874{
3875 Q_Q(QHeaderView);
3876 size = qBound(min: q->minimumSectionSize(), val: size, max: q->maximumSectionSize());
3877 executePostedLayout();
3878 invalidateCachedSizeHint();
3879 defaultSectionSize = size;
3880 customDefaultSectionSize = true;
3881 if (state == QHeaderViewPrivate::ResizeSection)
3882 preventCursorChangeInSetOffset = true;
3883 for (int i = 0; i < sectionItems.size(); ++i) {
3884 QHeaderViewPrivate::SectionItem &section = sectionItems[i];
3885 if (hiddenSectionSize.isEmpty() || !isVisualIndexHidden(visual: i)) { // resize on not hidden.
3886 const int newSize = size;
3887 if (newSize != section.size) {
3888 length += newSize - section.size; //the whole length is changed
3889 const int oldSectionSize = section.sectionSize();
3890 section.size = size;
3891 emit q->sectionResized(logicalIndex: logicalIndex(visualIndex: i), oldSize: oldSectionSize, newSize: size);
3892 }
3893 }
3894 }
3895 sectionStartposRecalc = true;
3896 if (hasAutoResizeSections())
3897 doDelayedResizeSections();
3898 viewport->update();
3899}

3905 defaultSectionSize = q->style()->pixelMetric(metric: QStyle::PM_HeaderDefaultSectionSizeHorizontal, option: nullptr, widget: q);
3906 } else {
3907 defaultSectionSize = qMax(a: q->minimumSectionSize(),
3908 b: q->style()->pixelMetric(metric: QStyle::PM_HeaderDefaultSectionSizeVertical, option: nullptr, widget: q));
3909 }

3912void QHeaderViewPrivate::recalcSectionStartPos() const // linear (but fast)
3913{
3914 int pixelpos = 0;
3915 for (const SectionItem &i : sectionItems) {
3916 i.calculated_startpos = pixelpos; // write into const mutable
3917 pixelpos += i.size;
3918 }
3919 sectionStartposRecalc = false;
3920}

3925 QHeaderView::ResizeMode mode = headerSectionResizeMode(visual: visualIndex);
3926 createSectionItems(start: visualIndex, end: visualIndex, sizePerSection: newSize, mode);
3927 emit q->sectionResized(logicalIndex: logicalIndex(visualIndex), oldSize, newSize);

3946
3947int QHeaderViewPrivate::headerVisualIndexAt(int position) const
3948{
3949 if (sectionStartposRecalc)
3950 recalcSectionStartPos();
3951 int startidx = 0;
3952 int endidx = sectionItems.size() - 1;
3953 while (startidx <= endidx) {
3954 int middle = (endidx + startidx) / 2;
3955 if (sectionItems.at(i: middle).calculated_startpos > position) {
3956 endidx = middle - 1;
3957 } else {
3958 if (sectionItems.at(i: middle).calculatedEndPos() <= position)
3959 startidx = middle + 1;
3960 else // we found it.
3961 return middle;
3962 }
3963 }
3964 return -1;
3965}

3970 createSectionItems(start: visual, end: visual, sizePerSection: size, mode);

3973QHeaderView::ResizeMode QHeaderViewPrivate::headerSectionResizeMode(int visual) const

3975 if (visual < 0 || visual >= sectionItems.size())
3976 return globalResizeMode;
3977 return static_cast<QHeaderView::ResizeMode>(sectionItems.at(i: visual).resizeMode);
3978}

3983 for (int i = 0; i < sectionItems.size(); ++i)
3984 sectionItems[i].resizeMode = mode;

3987int QHeaderViewPrivate::viewSectionSizeHint(int logical) const
3988{
3989 if (QAbstractItemView *view = qobject_cast<QAbstractItemView*>(object: parent)) {
3990 return (orientation == Qt::Horizontal
3991 ? view->sizeHintForColumn(column: logical)
3992 : view->sizeHintForRow(row: logical));
3993 }
3994 return 0;
3995}
3996
3997int QHeaderViewPrivate::adjustedVisualIndex(int visualIndex) const
3998{
3999 if (!hiddenSectionSize.isEmpty()) {
4000 int adjustedVisualIndex = visualIndex;
4001 int currentVisualIndex = 0;
4002 for (int i = 0; i < sectionItems.size(); ++i) {
4003 if (isVisualIndexHidden(visual: i))
4004 ++adjustedVisualIndex;
4005 else
4006 ++currentVisualIndex;
4007 if (currentVisualIndex >= visualIndex)
4008 break;
4009 }
4010 visualIndex = adjustedVisualIndex;
4011 }
4012 return visualIndex;
4013}

4015void QHeaderViewPrivate::setScrollOffset(const QScrollBar *scrollBar, QAbstractItemView::ScrollMode scrollMode)
4016{
4017 Q_Q(QHeaderView);
4018 if (scrollMode == QAbstractItemView::ScrollPerItem) {
4019 if (scrollBar->maximum() > 0 && scrollBar->value() == scrollBar->maximum())
4020 q->setOffsetToLastSection();
4021 else
4022 q->setOffsetToSectionPosition(scrollBar->value());
4023 } else {
4024 q->setOffset(scrollBar->value());
4025 }
4026}

4028void QHeaderViewPrivate::updateSectionsBeforeAfter(int logical)
4029{
4030 Q_Q(QHeaderView);
4031 const int visual = visualIndex(logicalIndex: logical);
4032 int from = logicalIndex(visualIndex: visual > 1 ? visual - 1 : 0);
4033 int to = logicalIndex(visualIndex: visual + 1 >= sectionCount() ? visual : visual + 1);
4034 QRect updateRect;
4035 if (orientation == Qt::Horizontal) {
4036 if (reverse())
4037 std::swap(a&: from, b&: to);
4038 updateRect = QRect(QPoint(q->sectionViewportPosition(logicalIndex: from), 0),
4039 QPoint(q->sectionViewportPosition(logicalIndex: to) + headerSectionSize(visual: to), viewport->height()));
4040 } else {
4041 updateRect = QRect(QPoint(0, q->sectionViewportPosition(logicalIndex: from)),
4042 QPoint(viewport->width(), q->sectionViewportPosition(logicalIndex: to) + headerSectionSize(visual: to)));
4043 }
4044 viewport->update(updateRect);
4045}

4082
4083bool QHeaderViewPrivate::read(QDataStream &in)
4084{
4085 Q_Q(QHeaderView);
4086 int orient, order, align, global;
4087 int sortIndicatorSectionIn;
4088 bool sortIndicatorShownIn;
4089 int lengthIn;
4090 QList<int> visualIndicesIn;
4091 QList<int> logicalIndicesIn;
4092 QHash<int, int> hiddenSectionSizeIn;
4093 bool movableSectionsIn;
4094 bool clickableSectionsIn;
4095 bool highlightSelectedIn;
4096 bool stretchLastSectionIn;
4097 bool cascadingResizingIn;
4098 int stretchSectionsIn;
4099 int contentsSectionsIn;
4100 int defaultSectionSizeIn;
4101 int minimumSectionSizeIn;
4102 QList<SectionItem> sectionItemsIn;
4103
4104 in >> orient;
4105 in >> order;
4106
4107 in >> sortIndicatorSectionIn;
4108 in >> sortIndicatorShownIn;
4109
4110 in >> visualIndicesIn;
4111 in >> logicalIndicesIn;
4112
4113 QBitArray sectionHidden;
4114 in >> sectionHidden;
4115 in >> hiddenSectionSizeIn;
4116 in >> lengthIn;
4117
4118 int unusedSectionCount; // For compatibility
4119 in >> unusedSectionCount;
4120
4121 if (in.status() != QDataStream::Ok || lengthIn < 0)
4122 return false;
4123
4124 in >> movableSectionsIn;
4125 in >> clickableSectionsIn;
4126 in >> highlightSelectedIn;
4127 in >> stretchLastSectionIn;
4128 in >> cascadingResizingIn;
4129 in >> stretchSectionsIn;
4130 in >> contentsSectionsIn;
4131 in >> defaultSectionSizeIn;
4132 in >> minimumSectionSizeIn;
4133
4134 in >> align;
4135
4136 in >> global;
4137
4138 // Check parameter consistency
4139 // Global orientation out of bounds?
4140 if (global < 0 || global > QHeaderView::ResizeToContents)
4141 return false;
4142
4143 // Alignment out of bounds?
4144 if (align < 0 || align > Qt::AlignVertical_Mask)
4145 return false;
4146
4147 in >> sectionItemsIn;
4148 // In Qt4 we had a vector of spans where one span could hold information on more sections.
4149 // Now we have an itemvector where one items contains information about one section
4150 // For backward compatibility with Qt4 we do the following
4151 QList<SectionItem> newSectionItems;
4152 for (int u = 0; u < sectionItemsIn.size(); ++u) {
4153 int count = sectionItemsIn.at(i: u).tmpDataStreamSectionCount;
4154 if (count > 1)
4155 sectionItemsIn[u].size /= count;
4156 for (int n = 0; n < count; ++n)
4157 newSectionItems.append(t: sectionItemsIn[u]);
4158 }
4159
4160 int sectionItemsLengthTotal = 0;
4161 for (const SectionItem &section : std::as_const(t&: newSectionItems))
4162 sectionItemsLengthTotal += section.size;
4163 if (sectionItemsLengthTotal != lengthIn)
4164 return false;
4165
4166 const int currentCount = (orient == Qt::Horizontal ? model->columnCount(parent: root) : model->rowCount(parent: root));
4167 if (newSectionItems.size() < currentCount) {
4168 // we have sections not in the saved state, give them default settings
4169 if (!visualIndicesIn.isEmpty() && !logicalIndicesIn.isEmpty()) {
4170 for (int i = newSectionItems.size(); i < currentCount; ++i) {
4171 visualIndicesIn.append(t: i);
4172 logicalIndicesIn.append(t: i);
4173 }
4174 }
4175 const int insertCount = currentCount - newSectionItems.size();
4176 const int insertLength = defaultSectionSizeIn * insertCount;
4177 lengthIn += insertLength;
4178 SectionItem section(defaultSectionSizeIn, globalResizeMode);
4179 newSectionItems.insert(i: newSectionItems.size(), n: insertCount, t: section); // append
4180 }
4181
4182 orientation = static_cast<Qt::Orientation>(orient);
4183 sortIndicatorOrder = static_cast<Qt::SortOrder>(order);
4184 sortIndicatorSection = sortIndicatorSectionIn;
4185 sortIndicatorShown = sortIndicatorShownIn;
4186 visualIndices = visualIndicesIn;
4187 logicalIndices = logicalIndicesIn;
4188 hiddenSectionSize = hiddenSectionSizeIn;
4189 length = lengthIn;
4190
4191 movableSections = movableSectionsIn;
4192 clickableSections = clickableSectionsIn;
4193 highlightSelected = highlightSelectedIn;
4194 stretchLastSection = stretchLastSectionIn;
4195 cascadingResizing = cascadingResizingIn;
4196 stretchSections = stretchSectionsIn;
4197 contentsSections = contentsSectionsIn;
4198 defaultSectionSize = defaultSectionSizeIn;
4199 minimumSectionSize = minimumSectionSizeIn;
4200
4201 defaultAlignment = Qt::Alignment(align);
4202 globalResizeMode = static_cast<QHeaderView::ResizeMode>(global);
4203
4204 sectionItems = newSectionItems;
4205 setHiddenSectionsFromBitVector(sectionHidden);
4206 recalcSectionStartPos();
4207
4208 int tmpint;
4209 in >> tmpint;
4210 if (in.status() == QDataStream::Ok) // we haven't read past end
4211 resizeContentsPrecision = tmpint;
4212
4213 bool tmpbool;
4214 in >> tmpbool;
4215 if (in.status() == QDataStream::Ok) { // we haven't read past end
4216 customDefaultSectionSize = tmpbool;
4217 if (!customDefaultSectionSize)
4218 updateDefaultSectionSizeFromStyle();
4219 }
4220
4221 lastSectionSize = -1;
4222 int inLastSectionSize;
4223 in >> inLastSectionSize;
4224 if (in.status() == QDataStream::Ok)
4225 lastSectionSize = inLastSectionSize;
4226
4227 lastSectionLogicalIdx = -1;
4228 if (stretchLastSection) {
4229 lastSectionLogicalIdx = q->logicalIndex(visualIndex: lastVisibleVisualIndex());
4230 doDelayedResizeSections();
4231 }
4232
4233 int inSortIndicatorClearable;
4234 in >> inSortIndicatorClearable;
4235 if (in.status() == QDataStream::Ok) // we haven't read past end
4236 sortIndicatorClearable = inSortIndicatorClearable;
4237
4238 return true;
4239}
